name: tm83
effect: Teaches Natural Gift to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Work Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Natural Gift)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time.
